author: The Associated Press
title: Wuhan's favorite noodles are back as virus-hit city recovers
description: The reappearance of Wuhan's favorite noodles is a tasty sign that life is slowly returning to normal in the Chinese city at the epicenter of the global coronavirus outbreak
content:
WUHAN, China -- 
The reappearance of Wuhan's favorite breakfast noodles is a tasty sign that life is slowly getting back to normal in the Chinese city at the epicenter of the global cornavirus outbreak. 
Zhou Guoqiong still isn't allowed to serve customers … [+5648 chars]
